      public burgerBullet(city.cs.engine.World w, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos, Enemy parent)
      Constructor for burgerBullet

      Creates a new burger bullet and fires it in the same direction as the one parent is moving to.

    • beEaten

      public void beEaten()
      Sets animation to be eaten.

      Sets an eaten animation(for destroying) using superclass method changeAnim() Also starts a timer that will destroy this object.
